meanings.definition: A technique of inlaying wood with various colored woods or other materials to create a design.
meanings.sent1: The artist used tarsia to create a beautiful wooden pattern.
meanings.sent2: Tarsia is a method of decorating wood with different colors.
meanings.sent3: The tarsia design on the table made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her tarsia work was like a colorful puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The intricate tarsia on the cabinet caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative work in which small pieces of variously colored wood, ivory, metal, etc., are inlaid to form a picture or design.
meanings.sent1: The tarsia on the jewelry box was made of tiny wood pieces.
meanings.sent2: She admired the tarsia on the antique dresser.
meanings.sent3: The tarsia on the clock looked like a tiny mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The tarsia on the frame added elegance to the mirror.
meanings.sent5: The intricate tarsia on the door depicted a forest scene.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative work in which small pieces of variously colored wood, ivory, metal, etc., are inlaid to form a picture or design.
meanings.sent1: The tarsia on the chessboard was made with precision.
meanings.sent2: The intricate tarsia on the table was a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The tarsia on the box looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She marveled at the tarsia on the cabinet doors.
meanings.sent5: The tarsia on the wall depicted a beautiful landscape.
